December 27, 1968
Mr. Samuel C. 0. Holt
Director
The Public Radio Study
1384 Massachusetts Avenue
Cambridge, Massachusetts 01238
Dear Sam;
Sometime when you aren’t busy, dredge out one
of the Kear and Kennedy educational radio
coverage maps (either the combined AM-FM or the
FM) and study the coverage indicated along the
Idaho-Oregon border. There’s a circle of alleged
coverage there about half dollar size. I’ll buy
you lunch if you can find any station in that
area providing FM coverage (or AM) in the area in¬
dicated on the map.
It makes me wonder about the r eliability of the
rest of the map. Wonder where that coverage really
belongs.
Look forward to seeing you again and learning more
about your travels to educational radio land.
Regards to Vince and best wishes for the holidays
to you both.
Sincerely,
Robert A. Mott
